text.section: "Secretary" means the secretary of the Energy and Environment Cabinet.
"Cabinet" means the Energy and Environment Cabinet.
"Local government" means any county or city.
"Environmental noise" and "ambient noise" means the intensity, duration, and character of sounds from all sources.
"Ultimate purchaser" means the first person who in good faith purchases a product for purposes other than resale.

"Person" means an individual, corporation, partnership, or association, and includes any officer, employee, department, agency, or instrumentality of the United States, a state, or any political subdivision of a state.
"Noise" means the intensity, frequency, duration, and character of sounds from a source or number of sources. Noise includes vibrations of subaudible frequency.
"Product" means any manufactured article or goods or component thereof.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 364, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. III, secs. 1 and 13, effective June 21, 1974; and ch. 99, sec. 3, effective June 21, 1974.
